header.title:
The future of fitness 
and wellness

gridSection.title: The most powerful training tracking and analysis system
gridSection.subTitle: Progress every day

apcoCardContent.title: All you need.
apcoCardContent.subTitle: In one app.
apcoCardContent.flipContent:
Discover new workouts, get inspired, share your progress and passion or follow your progress with accurate and complete statistics on your activity. 
You can even access the services and programs of certified professionals from the marketplace.

apcoCardContent.title: Recognize the exercises.
apcoCardContent.flipContent: We have developed the first on-board system that recognizes the movements you make during your workout. With it, you can concretely see your progress and your evolution and follow all your training sessions.

apcoCardContent.title:
Automatic writing of the 
 training log.
apcoCardContent.flipContent: You can throw away your old workout book. Thanks to our powerful intelligent system, we can automatically write down your workout live.

apcoCardContent.title: All your stats.
apcoCardContent.subTitle: Customizable.
apcoCardContent.flipContent:
Customize your logbook to view statistics tailored to your goals.
You can share your progress with your friends and see where they are in their goals to encourage and support them.

imageSection.title: Control. Manage. Share.
imageSection.subTitle:

all in the Athletid App.
